effect.short: Power is doubled if the target has already moved this turn.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target uses a move or switches out this turn before this move is used, this move has double power.

flavorTexts.text:
The user stores power, then attacks. If the user
moves after the target, this attack’s power will
be doubled.
